TopicTitle: [1.0.5] Stryker's Aerospace and Armory (Continued by SM)

I mean engines in the shape of the real ones.

KAX has a nice radial, and a turboprop that works aesthetically as a radial or not (FW 190, La-7)
Would you mind moving the cockpits to science as they are starting to clutter up my cockpit tab :S

Would you mind moving the cockpits to science as they are starting to clutter up my cockpit tab :S

You can change it yourself in the part.cfg!

Just change the Category to: * category = Science *

Also, 'old on a sec. The G-6 didn't have those wee side windows at the bottom-front....Only had them till the F-4

E-4 ---------> G-14 (basically the same thing)

Hey people! If you don't mind, like/upvote or Favorite my mod in Curse and leave a reply to show everybody, that doesen't visit the forums, what they are missing

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/224383-strykers-aerospace-restored-cockpits

Cheers! Thank you for your support, you are all amazing!

You say it like it's a job or something, reichtangle, i do this because i like doing it. Not because i have to.

The Poly count on my Lagg-3 cockpit is too high, i just spent the past 4 hours making this sucker, it will take a but more to texture....but the model ingame will look very buggy (look at the Mig-21 for example, the poly count on that one was high, the LAgg-3 is higher)

Im sorry but the lagg-3 will have to be on stand-by, i will pick it up when im more skillfull in Sketchup....For now will make something more simple.
